productDescription:
The Twisted stacking ring is a  sophisticated handmade 14K golden ring.
This twisted style gives this ring a tough yet elegant look. Wear this ring individually or stack it up with some other golden rings to complete your serie.

optionalInfo.production: Handmade in our Amsterdam based Atelier of recycled gold.
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: We pack your order in plastic-free package material. Free shipping on all NL orders.
